details.arabic_diacless: بسم اللٰه مجر۪ىٰها ومرسىٰهاۚ ان ربى لـغفور رحيم
details.arabic: بِسۡمِ اللّٰهِ مَجْر۪ىٰهَا وَمُرْسَىٰهَآۚ اِنَّ رَبِّىۡ لَـغَفُوۡرٌ رَّحِيۡمٌ
details.transliteration: bismillahi majre-ha wa mursa-ha, inna  lagafu-rur ra'heem
details.translations: in the name of Allah is its course and its anchorage. Indeed, my Lord is Forgiving and Merciful."
